_meta.description: Index des 6 classes jouables avec subclasses et lore
_meta.description_en: Index of 6 playable classes with subclasses and lore

classes.name: Warrior
classes.identity: Frontline melee bruiser/tank + taunt + row/column pressure
classes.description: Le Guerrier est le pilier de toute formation. Il attire l'attention des ennemis, protege ses allies et frappe avec une force devastatrice.
classes.description_en: The Warrior is the pillar of any formation. He draws enemy attention, protects allies and strikes with devastating force.
classes.lore: Forges dans les guerres contre les Fissures, les Guerriers sont les derniers remparts de la civilisation.
classes.lore_en: Forged in wars against the Rifts, Warriors are civilization's last bulwarks.
classes.wiki_intro: Le Guerrier est la classe ideale pour ceux qui veulent etre au coeur de l'action. Robuste et resilient, il excelle a proteger ses allies en attirant l'attention des ennemis. Que vous preferiez absorber les degats comme un Guardian indestructible ou dechainer votre rage comme un Berserker sanguinaire, le Guerrier offre une experience de combat visceral et gratifiante. Sa position en premiere ligne lui permet de controler le rythme du combat et de creer des ouvertures pour son equipe.
classes.wiki_intro_en: The Warrior is the ideal class for those who want to be at the heart of the action. Sturdy and resilient, they excel at protecting allies by drawing enemy attention. Whether you prefer absorbing damage as an indestructible Guardian or unleashing your rage as a bloodthirsty Berserker, the Warrior offers a visceral and rewarding combat experience. Their frontline position allows them to control the pace of battle and create openings for their team.
playstyle_tips: Utilisez Taunt pour proteger vos allies fragiles
Gerez vos cooldowns defensifs pour les moments critiques
playstyle_tips_en: Use Taunt to protect fragile allies
Manage defensive cooldowns for critical moments

subclasses.name: Guardian
subclasses.identity: Pure tank protector + shields + team mitigation
subclasses.description: Le Guardian protege ses allies coute que coute, attirant la fureur ennemie et absorbant des degats mortels.
subclasses.description_en: The Guardian protects allies at all costs, drawing enemy fury and absorbing deadly damage.
subclasses.lore: Heritiers des anciens remparts, les Guardians sont le dernier mur entre les Fissures et le monde civilise.
subclasses.lore_en: Heirs of ancient bulwarks, Guardians are the last wall between the Rifts and the civilized world.

tier3.identity: Immovable fortress + extreme self-defense + damage immunity windows
Guardian angel + ally protection specialist + damage redirection

subclasses.name: Berserker
subclasses.identity: Bruiser DPS + self-buff rage + row pressure
subclasses.description: Le Berserker sacrifie sa propre survie pour des frappes d'une violence inouie, plus dangereux a mesure qu'il saigne.
subclasses.description_en: The Berserker sacrifices survival for strikes of unmatched violence, growing deadlier as he bleeds.
subclasses.lore: Marques par les Abysses, ces guerriers ont appris a transformer la douleur en puissance brute.
subclasses.lore_en: Marked by the Abyss, these warriors learned to turn pain into raw power.

tier3.identity: Life steal bruiser + sustain through damage + stronger at low HP
Speed demon + multi-hit attacks + attack speed buffs

subclasses.name: Weapon Master
subclasses.identity: Technique melee + armor break + one big hit identity
subclasses.description: Le Weapon Master s'adapte a chaque combat, exploitant la moindre ouverture avec une precision mortelle.
subclasses.description_en: The Weapon Master adapts to every fight, exploiting any opening with deadly precision.
subclasses.lore: Experts des ecoles martiales disparues, les Weapon Masters incarnent la discipline et l'excellence au combat.
subclasses.lore_en: Experts of lost martial schools, Weapon Masters embody discipline and combat excellence.

tier3.identity: Heavy weapon specialist + stun machine + armor crusher
Twin weapon specialist + bleed stacking + brutal multi-hit

subclasses.name: Warlord
subclasses.identity: Leader support + offensive buffs + controlled pressure
subclasses.description: Le Warlord domine le champ de bataille par son autorite, renforcant ses allies et brisant la volonte ennemie.
subclasses.description_en: The Warlord dominates the battlefield through authority, empowering allies and breaking enemy will.
subclasses.lore: Chefs de guerre et strateges, les Warlords menent leurs troupes comme une seule lame.
subclasses.lore_en: War chiefs and strategists, Warlords lead their troops as a single blade.

tier3.identity: Team buffer + morale booster + strategic support
Fear and intimidation + enemy debuffer + psychological warfare

classes.name: Mage
classes.description: Le Mage canalise les forces arcanes pour infliger des degats devastateurs a distance, controlant le champ de bataille par la magie.
classes.description_en: The Mage channels arcane forces to inflict devastating damage from range, controlling the battlefield through magic.
classes.lore: Les Mages puisent leur pouvoir dans les Fissures elles-memes, maitrisant des forces que d'autres craignent.
classes.lore_en: Mages draw power from the Rifts themselves, mastering forces others fear.
classes.wiki_intro: Le Mage est le maitre inconteste des degats magiques a distance. Capable de decimer des groupes entiers d'un seul sort ou de neutraliser une cible prioritaire, il represente une menace constante depuis l'arriere-garde. Ses specialisations offrent des styles varies : l'Elementalist dechaine les forces primaires, l'Occultist corrompt et affaiblit, le Cardmaster joue avec le destin, et le Spellblade ose s'aventurer au corps a corps. Fragile mais devastateur, le Mage recompense les joueurs qui maitrisent le positionnement et le timing.
classes.wiki_intro_en: The Mage is the undisputed master of ranged magical damage. Capable of decimating entire groups with a single spell or neutralizing a priority target, they represent a constant threat from the backline. Their specializations offer varied playstyles: the Elementalist unleashes primal forces, the Occultist corrupts and weakens, the Cardmaster plays with fate, and the Spellblade dares venture into melee. Fragile but devastating, the Mage rewards players who master positioning and timing.
playstyle_tips: Restez a distance et laissez le tank absorber l'aggro
Ciblez les ennemis groupes pour maximiser vos AoE
Gardez un sort de controle pour vous proteger
playstyle_tips_en: Stay at range and let the tank absorb aggro
Target grouped enemies to maximize AoE
Keep a control spell ready for self-protection

subclasses.name: Elementalist
subclasses.identity: Elemental damage + clear AoE shapes
subclasses.description: L'Elementalist faconne le champ de bataille en dechainant feu, glace et energie brute.
subclasses.description_en: The Elementalist shapes the battlefield by unleashing fire, ice and raw energy.
subclasses.lore: Nes au coeur des Fissures elementaires, les Elementalists ont appris a plier les forces primordiales.
subclasses.lore_en: Born at the heart of elemental Rifts, Elementalists learned to bend primal forces.

tier3.identity: Ice control + roots + safe AoE pressure
Lightning tempo + stuns + wide pressure

subclasses.name: Occultist
subclasses.identity: Dark magic pressure + debuffs + disruptive control
subclasses.description: L'Occultist affaiblit l'ennemi par des maledictions, drains et rituels interdits.
subclasses.description_en: The Occultist weakens enemies through curses, drains and forbidden rituals.
subclasses.lore: Certains mages ont choisi d'etudier les Abysses plutot que de les combattre.
subclasses.lore_en: Some mages chose to study the Abyss rather than fight it.

tier3.identity: Pure arcane burst + silence + magic resist shred
No-pet summoning: manifestations, fear and marks

subclasses.name: Cardmaster
subclasses.identity: Luck manipulation + flexible patterns + burst windows
subclasses.description: Le Card Master manipule le hasard lui-meme, redistribuant buffs et calamites.
subclasses.description_en: The Card Master manipulates chance itself, redistributing buffs and calamities.
subclasses.lore: Influences par les Koros, ces mages ont appris que le destin pouvait etre triche.
subclasses.lore_en: Influenced by the Koros, these mages learned that fate can be cheated.

tier3.identity: Consistent combo DPS + crit windows + marked focus
High variance debuffs + luck manipulation + clutch plays

subclasses.name: Spellblade
subclasses.identity: Hybrid: melee magic + self buffs
subclasses.description: Le Spellblade mele magie et acier, frappant rapidement au coeur de la melee.
subclasses.description_en: The Spellblade blends magic and steel, striking swiftly at the heart of melee.
subclasses.lore: Formes dans des ordres martiaux arcanes, les Spellblades combattent la ou la magie seule ne suffit pas.
subclasses.lore_en: Trained in arcane martial orders, Spellblades fight where magic alone falls short.

tier3.identity: Melee arcane bruiser + stuns + self shields
Defensive arcane knight + wards + magic resist buffs

classes.name: Healer
classes.description: Le Healer maintient son equipe en vie, soignant les blessures et dissipant les maledictions.
classes.description_en: The Healer keeps the team alive, healing wounds and dispelling curses.
classes.lore: Les Healers ont jure de preserver la vie face aux horreurs des Fissures.
classes.lore_en: Healers swore to preserve life against the horrors of the Rifts.
classes.wiki_intro: Le Healer est le pilier invisible de toute equipe. Sans lui, meme les guerriers les plus robustes finissent par tomber. Cette classe demande une excellente conscience de la situation : surveiller les barres de vie, anticiper les degats, et savoir quand purifier un debuff critique. Le Lifewarden regenere patiemment, le Lightbringer soigne en urgence, le Chantre peut meme ressusciter les tombes, et le Soulreaper pratique une magie de sang risquee mais puissante. Jouer Healer, c'est accepter que la victoire de l'equipe passe avant votre gloire personnelle.
classes.wiki_intro_en: The Healer is the invisible pillar of any team. Without them, even the sturdiest warriors eventually fall. This class demands excellent situational awareness: monitoring health bars, anticipating damage, and knowing when to purify a critical debuff. The Lifewarden patiently regenerates, the Lightbringer heals urgently, the Cantor can even resurrect the fallen, and the Soulreaper practices risky but powerful blood magic. Playing Healer means accepting that team victory comes before personal glory.
playstyle_tips: Surveillez les barres de vie de toute l'equipe
Gardez vos gros soins pour les situations critiques
Purifiez les debuffs dangereux en priorite
playstyle_tips_en: Monitor the entire team's health bars
Save big heals for critical situations

subclasses.name: Lifewarden
subclasses.identity: Sustain + regen + light defensive AoE
subclasses.description: Le Lifewarden soigne par la nature elle-meme, regenerant lentement mais surement ses allies.
subclasses.description_en: The Lifewarden heals through nature itself, slowly but surely regenerating allies.
subclasses.lore: Lies aux forces vitales du monde, les Lifewardens croient que toute blessure peut guerir.
subclasses.lore_en: Bound to the world's vital forces, Lifewardens believe any wound can heal.

tier3.identity: Ancient regen + protective nature wards
Nature shields + thorns + protective auras

subclasses.name: Lightbringer
subclasses.identity: Burst heals + holy buffs
subclasses.description: Le Lightbringer dissipe les tenebres par des soins instantanes et une lumiere purificatrice.
subclasses.description_en: The Lightbringer dispels darkness with instant heals and purifying light.
subclasses.lore: Choisis par des ordres sacres, les Lightbringers incarnent l'espoir face aux horreurs.
subclasses.lore_en: Chosen by sacred orders, Lightbringers embody hope against horrors.

tier3.identity: Cleanse specialist + anti-curse protection
Frontline healer + shields + holy strikes

subclasses.name: Cantor
subclasses.identity: Sacred hymns + resurrection + holy purification
subclasses.description: Le Chantre chante des hymnes sacres qui soignent, purifient et peuvent meme ramener les allies tombes.
subclasses.description_en: The Cantor sings sacred hymns that heal, purify and can even bring back fallen allies.
subclasses.lore: Seuls les Chantres connaissent les paroles anciennes capables de rappeler une ame du seuil de la mort.
subclasses.lore_en: Only Cantors know the ancient words able to recall a soul from death's threshold.

tier3.identity: Anti-undead specialist + purification + banish debuffs
Mass resurrection + team-wide sacred protection

subclasses.name: Soulreaper
subclasses.identity: Blood magic + lifesteal + sacrifice healing
subclasses.description: Le Soulreaper sacrifie sa propre vie pour proteger ses allies, drainant l'energie vitale des ennemis.
subclasses.description_en: The Soulreaper sacrifices their own life to protect allies, draining vital energy from enemies.
subclasses.lore: Ces guerisseurs ont appris que la vie et la mort ne sont que deux faces d'une meme piece.
subclasses.lore_en: These healers learned that life and death are but two sides of the same coin.

tier3.identity: Lifesteal specialist + self-sustain + drain attacks
Life link + sacrifice healing + soul shields

classes.name: Archer
classes.identity: Ranged physical DPS + terrain-style control via patterns + marked focus
classes.description: L'Archer frappe de loin avec precision, marquant ses cibles et controlant le terrain par ses tirs.
classes.description_en: The Archer strikes from afar with precision, marking targets and controlling terrain through shots.
classes.lore: Chasseurs des terres sauvages, les Archers ont appris a survivre la ou nul autre n'ose s'aventurer.
classes.lore_en: Hunters of the wilds, Archers learned to survive where no one else dares venture.
classes.wiki_intro: L'Archer combine distance de securite et degats physiques constants. Contrairement au Mage qui mise sur de gros pics de degats, l'Archer maintient une pression soutenue tout au long du combat. Le systeme de marquage lui permet de concentrer le feu de l'equipe sur une cible prioritaire. Le Ranger offre une fiabilite classique, le Falconer synchronise ses frappes avec son faucon, le Ball Master cree le chaos avec des projectiles rebondissants, et le Gunslinger declenche des rafales devastatrices. L'Archer recompense les joueurs qui aiment le controle et la precision.
classes.wiki_intro_en: The Archer combines safe distance with constant physical damage. Unlike the Mage who relies on big damage spikes, the Archer maintains sustained pressure throughout combat. The marking system allows focusing team fire on priority targets. The Ranger offers classic reliability, the Falconer synchronizes strikes with their falcon, the Ball Master creates chaos with bouncing projectiles, and the Gunslinger unleashes devastating bursts. The Archer rewards players who enjoy control and precision.
playstyle_tips: Marquez les cibles prioritaires pour concentrer le feu
Utilisez vos patterns pour controler le terrain
playstyle_tips_en: Mark priority targets to focus fire

subclasses.name: Ranger
subclasses.identity: Classic archer + reliable DPS + critical strikes + versatile shots
subclasses.description: Le Ranger excelle dans un tir constant et precis, usant l'ennemi sans relache.
subclasses.description_en: The Ranger excels at constant, precise shooting, wearing down enemies relentlessly.
subclasses.lore: Chasseurs des terres sauvages, les Rangers ont appris a survivre seuls.
subclasses.lore_en: Hunters of the wilds, Rangers learned to survive alone.

tier3.identity: Critical strike specialist + precision damage + high burst windows
Mobile archer + hit & run + evasion + sustained pressure

subclasses.name: Falconer
subclasses.identity: Burst windows via companion strikes (no persistent summon unit)
subclasses.description: Le Falconer combat aux cotes de son faucon, marquant et harcelant l'ennemi sans repit.
subclasses.description_en: The Falconer fights alongside their falcon, marking and harassing enemies without respite.
subclasses.lore: Un lien ancestral unit ces archers a leurs compagnons ailes, formant un duo mortel.
subclasses.lore_en: An ancestral bond unites these archers with their winged companions, forming a deadly duo.

tier3.identity: Perfect sync + maximum burst + coordinated dive attacks
Hit & run + evasion + constant harass + aerial mobility

subclasses.name: Ballmaster
subclasses.identity: Special projectiles + bouncing attacks + trick shots + creative damage
subclasses.description: Le Ball Master projette des attaques imprevisibles qui ricochent et frappent plusieurs cibles.
subclasses.description_en: The Ball Master launches unpredictable attacks that ricochet and hit multiple targets.
subclasses.lore: Nee d'arts martiaux exotiques, cette discipline transforme l'arene en terrain de jeu mortel.
subclasses.lore_en: Born from exotic martial arts, this discipline turns the arena into a deadly playground.

tier3.identity: Ricocheting projectiles + multi-target chains + spreading damage
Rapid combos + trick shots + speed burst + multi-hit

subclasses.name: Gunslinger
subclasses.identity: Rapid fire specialist + quick draw + burst shots + speed demon
subclasses.description: Le Gunslinger dechaine des rafales devastatrices avant de devoir recharger.
subclasses.description_en: The Gunslinger unleashes devastating bursts before needing to reload.
subclasses.lore: Ces tireurs ont adopte des armes experimentales issues des avancees technologiques recentes.
subclasses.lore_en: These shooters adopted experimental weapons from recent technological advances.

tier3.identity: Rapid fire bursts + speed buffs + multi-shot specialist
Extreme precision + execution shots + crit windows + finisher specialist

classes.name: Rogue
classes.identity: Single-target physical DPS + debuffs + target control (burst windows)
classes.description: Le Rogue frappe depuis les ombres, eliminant les cibles prioritaires avec une precision chirurgicale.
classes.description_en: The Rogue strikes from shadows, eliminating priority targets with surgical precision.
classes.lore: Formes dans l'ombre, ces assassins frappent la ou la defense s'effondre.
classes.lore_en: Trained in shadow, these assassins strike where defense crumbles.
classes.wiki_intro: Le Rogue est l'executeur ultime. La ou le Guerrier tient la ligne et le Mage frappe de loin, le Rogue contourne les defenses pour eliminer les cibles critiques : healers ennemis, mages devastateurs, ou boss affaiblis. C'est une classe a haut risque et haute recompense qui demande une excellente lecture du combat. Le Shadowblade assassine depuis les ombres, le Trickster seme la confusion, le Corsair combine lame et pistolet, et le Duelist maitrise l'art de la riposte. Jouer Rogue, c'est accepter d'etre fragile pour frapper plus fort.
classes.wiki_intro_en: The Rogue is the ultimate executioner. Where the Warrior holds the line and the Mage strikes from afar, the Rogue bypasses defenses to eliminate critical targets: enemy healers, devastating mages, or weakened bosses. It's a high-risk, high-reward class that demands excellent combat reading. The Shadowblade assassinates from shadows, the Trickster sows confusion, the Corsair combines blade and pistol, and the Duelist masters the art of riposte. Playing Rogue means accepting fragility to strike harder.
playstyle_tips: Attendez le bon moment pour frapper
Ciblez les healers et mages ennemis
playstyle_tips_en: Wait for the right moment to strike

subclasses.name: Shadowblade
subclasses.identity: Extreme single-target burst + stealth assassination + execution
subclasses.description: Le Shadowblade elimine les cibles vulnerables en contournant les lignes ennemies.
subclasses.description_en: The Shadowblade eliminates vulnerable targets by bypassing enemy lines.
subclasses.lore: Formes dans l'ombre, ces assassins frappent la ou la defense s'effondre.
subclasses.lore_en: Trained in shadow, these assassins strike where defense crumbles.

tier3.identity: Stealth windows + anti-caster assassination
Execution bursts + bleed stacking + finisher specialist

subclasses.name: Trickster
subclasses.identity: Disruption + misdirection + soft control (team play)
subclasses.description: Le Trickster seme le chaos en brouillant les priorites et la perception ennemie.
subclasses.description_en: The Trickster sows chaos by scrambling enemy priorities and perception.
subclasses.lore: Pour eux, le combat est un jeu de dupes ou l'esprit compte plus que la lame.
subclasses.lore_en: For them, combat is a game of deception where wit matters more than blade.

tier3.identity: Crippling debuffs + team utility + weakening specialist
Teleportation + hit & run + untargetable windows + evasion master

subclasses.name: Corsair
subclasses.identity: Pirate agility + hybrid melee/ranged + dirty tricks + swashbuckler
subclasses.description: Le Corsair taillade les rangs adverses par des attaques en balayage et des saignements cumules.
subclasses.description_en: The Corsair slashes through enemy ranks with sweeping attacks and stacking bleeds.
subclasses.lore: Pirates et mercenaires, les Corsairs vivent pour le risque et la liberte.
subclasses.lore_en: Pirates and mercenaries, Corsairs live for risk and freedom.

tier3.identity: Aggressive melee pirate + bleed + dirty fighting + burst DPS
Hybrid melee/ranged + pistol + sword combo + versatile fighter

subclasses.name: Duelist
subclasses.identity: Fast melee skirmisher + reliable line pressure
subclasses.description: Le Duelist excelle dans l'art de la riposte, retournant la force ennemie contre elle-meme.
subclasses.description_en: The Duelist excels at riposte, turning enemy strength against itself.
subclasses.lore: Eleves dans les traditions du duel, ces combattants privilegient technique et sang-froid.
subclasses.lore_en: Raised in dueling traditions, these fighters favor technique and composure.

tier3.identity: Multi-hit combos + crit stacking + flowing attacks
Defensive stance + riposte damage + punish attackers

classes.name: Artisan
classes.identity: Craft-based support + debuff setup + signature finishers
classes.description: L'Artisan apporte un soutien unique via ses metiers, preparant des ouvertures pour son equipe et finissant les cibles affaiblies.
classes.description_en: The Artisan provides unique support through crafts, setting up openings for the team and finishing weakened targets.
classes.lore: Ces maitres artisans ont transforme leurs savoirs ancestraux en armes de guerre.
classes.lore_en: These master craftsmen turned ancestral knowledge into weapons of war.
classes.wiki_intro: L'Artisan est la classe la plus originale de Kanarion Online. Plutot que de simplement infliger des degats ou soigner, il prepare le terrain pour son equipe. Ses debuffs creent des fenetres de vulnerabilite, ses buffs renforcent les allies au moment critique, et ses finishers punissent les ennemis affaiblis. Le Blacksmith brise les armures, l'Alchemist empoisonne et fait detoner, le Chef nourrit et galvanise, et le Musician controle le tempo du combat. L'Artisan brille en synergie avec son equipe et recompense les joueurs creatifs.
classes.wiki_intro_en: The Artisan is Kanarion Online's most original class. Rather than simply dealing damage or healing, they prepare the battlefield for their team. Their debuffs create vulnerability windows, their buffs empower allies at critical moments, and their finishers punish weakened enemies. The Blacksmith breaks armor, the Alchemist poisons and detonates, the Chef feeds and galvanizes, and the Musician controls combat tempo. The Artisan shines in team synergy and rewards creative players.
playstyle_tips: Preparez le terrain avec vos debuffs
Coordonnez vos finishers avec les burst de l'equipe
Adaptez votre metier a la composition
playstyle_tips_en: Prepare the field with your debuffs
Adapt your craft to team composition

subclasses.name: Blacksmith
subclasses.identity: Armor breaking + boss setup + brutal finisher
subclasses.description: Le Blacksmith frappe dur et brise les defenses ennemies pour preparer des fenetres de burst devastatrices.
subclasses.description_en: The Blacksmith hits hard and breaks enemy defenses to set up devastating burst windows.
subclasses.lore: Forgerons de guerre, ils ont appris a detruire ce qu'ils savaient creer.
subclasses.lore_en: War smiths, they learned to destroy what they knew how to create.

tier3.identity: Protective forging + shields + anti-CC anchor
Anti-boss breaker + brutal vulnerability windows

subclasses.name: Alchemist
subclasses.identity: Debuff pressure + DoT setup + reaction bursts
subclasses.description: L'Alchemist empoisonne et affaiblit ses ennemis, preparant des detonations chimiques devastatrices.
subclasses.description_en: The Alchemist poisons and weakens enemies, setting up devastating chemical detonations.
subclasses.lore: Ces savants ont decouvert que les potions les plus mortelles ne sont pas destinees a etre bues.
subclasses.lore_en: These scholars discovered that the deadliest potions aren't meant to be drunk.

tier3.identity: DoT stacking + soft control + attrition wins
Detonation windows + conditional burst + chain reactions

subclasses.name: Chef
subclasses.identity: Sustain + tempo + clutch team utilities
subclasses.description: Le Chef maintient son equipe en forme grace a des plats revigorants et des buffs de tempo.
subclasses.description_en: The Chef keeps the team in shape with invigorating dishes and tempo buffs.
subclasses.lore: Un bon repas peut gagner une bataille. Ces chefs l'ont prouve mille fois.
subclasses.lore_en: A good meal can win a battle. These chefs proved it a thousand times.

tier3.identity: Premium group support + tempo spikes
Aggressive support (burn + vulnerability) + pressure finisher

subclasses.name: Musician
subclasses.identity: Tempo control + clean buffs + team stability
subclasses.description: Le Musician inspire et protege par ses melodies, controlant le rythme du combat.
subclasses.description_en: The Musician inspires and protects through melodies, controlling the rhythm of combat.
subclasses.lore: Pour eux, chaque bataille est une symphonie dont ils sont le chef d'orchestre.
subclasses.lore_en: For them, every battle is a symphony they conduct.

tier3.identity: Classic support anchor + anti-CC team window
DPS pressure + mark windows + signature slam
